layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x90
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x90
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x66
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 194x18
          text run at (0,0) width 194: "There should be no red below."
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,34) size 80x32 [bgcolor=#FF0000]
        LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 80x16 [bgcolor=#0000FF]
        LayoutImage {IMG} at (0,16) size 80x16 [bgcolor=#FFFF00]
